Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay Vinh kho\u1ea3ng 10 km, c&aacute;ch b\u1ebfn xe Vinh kho\u1ea3ng 20 km.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Summer C\u1eeda L&ograve;<\/strong> n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng B&igrave;nh Minh, \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n qu\u1ea3ng tr\u01b0\u1eddng B&igrave;nh Minh. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n&nbsp; ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 4 sao. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sang tr\u1ecdng, kh&ocirc;ng gian th\u01a1 m\u1ed9ng. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf cao 25 t\u1ea7ng v\u1edbi 250 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 sang tr\u1ecdng ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng 4 sao c&oacute; h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i th&ocirc;ng minh, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng nh&agrave;&nbsp;\u0103n&nbsp;\u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf tinh t\u1ebf,&nbsp;\u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng&nbsp;\u0111i\u1ec1u h&ograve;a hi\u1ec7n&nbsp;\u0111\u1ea1i&nbsp;\u0111\u1ee7 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 600 th\u1ef1c kh&aacute;ch, l&agrave;
